item.title: Ghost 5.0 Has Arrived, Let's Deploy It with One Click on Digital Ocean
item.description: 《Here After Us - Mayday》 Preface I am an advocate of static blogs and serverless support. My personal blog and some knowledge base projects are generated using hugo and hosted on GitHub Pages. This approach is convenient for version control and deployment maintenance, but for non-technical individuals, using command-line git operations can be overly complex, and it’s not particularly convenient for scenarios involving multiple collaborators. Last week, a former colleague (non-technical) asked me to help set up a portal website, mainly to showcase company information and publish news, features, tools, etc.
